name: Bic 3 Razor
description: This razor features three blades that deliver a close shave and rinse easily. Its textured handle offers a firm yet comfortable grip, allowing you to shave with control and precision. This razor has a lubricating strip enriched with aloe and vitamin E to enhance the glide. These slim disposable razors slip easily in a gym bag or travel kit for quick touch-ups whenever the need arises. Each package includes four disposable razors. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
